rows.label: tlk4240008104_msg0001
rows.name: Hya hya hya! The power of science, mo!

rows.label: tlk4240008104_msg0002
rows.name:
I used to be in Acedia,
but now my lab, tools, and
money are all gone, mo.

rows.label: tlk4240008104_msg0003
rows.name:
I have no choice but to continue my
research here, crushing, mixing, and
burning ores and herbs, but...

rows.label: tlk4240008104_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm running out of money to buy
materials to burn... mo. I have
no choice but to work... mo.

rows.label: tlk4240008104_msg0005
rows.name:
Kyukyu hates manual labor, mo.
I don't want to work, mo...
